page.title: 20RIDING SCHOOL
page.content:
Hayfield Riding School, Aberdeen.
Hayfield Riding School was established in 1957 and has had 3 owners, the present owners being the Crawford family. There is a large outdoor area and 2 indoor schools which are in use throughout the winter. There are 65 ponies and horses and the school can cater for 240 children in a week with Tuesday reserved for the disabled and handicapped. Several people have their horses stabled at the school and train there to take part in show jumping competitions all over the country. Some of the older, more experienced horses have had unusual jobs such as Jackie who pulled Cinderella's coach in the pantomime in His Majesty's theatre and Calendar who has appeared with Stanley Baxter.
